survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and comfort with their digital workspace setups, including hardware, software, and ergonomic factors.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current digital workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current digital workspace setup?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital workspace tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture comprehensive tool usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital workspace tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any physical discomfort you experience due to your digital workspace setup.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any physical discomfort you experience due to your digital workspace setup.

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to rest your eyes or stretch during work hours?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure break frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to rest your eyes or stretch during work hours?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would improve your digital workspace ergonomics? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify improvement areas.

script.question_text: Which of the following would improve your digital workspace ergonomics? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Do you use software tools to remind you to take breaks or adjust your posture?
answer_options: I was not aware such tools exist
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess awareness and usage of ergonomic software.

script.question_text: Do you use software tools to remind you to take breaks or adjust your posture?
answer_options: I was not aware such tools exist

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q6, please specify which software tools you use.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q6 answer is 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to gather specific tool names.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q6, please specify which software tools you use.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q6 answer is 'Yes'

questions.question_text: How would you rate the lighting in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess lighting conditions.

script.question_text: How would you rate the lighting in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Does your employer provide ergonomic assessments or equipment?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to evaluate employer support.

script.question_text: Does your employer provide ergonomic assessments or equipment?

questions.question_text: What additional support would you like from your employer to improve your digital workspace ergonomics?

script.question_text: What additional support would you like from your employer to improve your digital workspace ergonomics?
